Mines of Moria: title=The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Mines of Moria

{{disambig-more: '''''The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Mines of Moria''''' is a boxed set for [[Games Workshop]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''. In addition to gaming miniatures, the boxed set includes two sourcebook supplements: '''''The Mines of Moria''''' (32 pages, paperback) and '''''Rules Manual''''' (112 pages, paperback).

Relive the exciting journey of The Fellowship of The Ring through the Mines of Moria. In this box you'll find a 112-page full color rules manual, 32-page Getting Started book, 34 highly detailed plastic miniatures including The Fellowship of The Ring, was well as 24 Moria Goblins and a Cave Troll. Balin's Tomb terrain pieces, dice, and The One Ring are also contained within - all you need to start playing The Lord of The Rings Strategy Battle Game. This boxed set serves as the perfect introduction to this exciting hobby.
*[http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/20044/the-lord-of-the-rings-the-mines-of-moria The Lord of the Rings: The Mines of Moria] at [http://boardgamegeek.com/ BoardGameGeek]
